myVelib.ride

Class Ride

  • java.lang.Object
    • myVelib.ride.Ride

  • public class Ride
extends java.lang.Object
    Ride class contains the informations of the ride : destination, departure, id, price, startime and bike. Depending on the policy we choose, elements might not be instanciated at first. Constructor is called only by Ride factories.
    Author:
    Ahmed Djermani
